Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Opportunity to purchase a strata warehouse unit improved with a walk-in cooler/freezer. The walk-in cooler/freezer features insulated concrete slab, new epoxy flooring and existing sprinklers. Main floor outside the cooler/freezer is also improved with waterproofing of walls and new epoxy flooring. The property is ideal for owner users in the food industrylooking for a turnkey cold storage facility. The property is located at Graybar Business Center on the West side of Graybar Road, between Westminster Highway and Dyke Road, in the prime Fraserwood industrial area.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited is pleased to present to the marketplace an excellent opportunity for an owner-user or investor to purchase a freestanding building located at 14500 River Road in the North Richmond area. The Subject Property is a corner site with excellent exposure and easy ingress/egress. Boasting beautiful views looking over the north arm of the Fraser River with the North Shore mountains in the background the Premises are currently occupied

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Opportunity to acquire a freestanding 10,460 square foot industrial warehouse building on 0.366 acres. 12511 Vickers Way features 2 grade loading doors, built-out office space and gated access from both Vickers Way and Bridgeport Road. The property is located a minute away from the Bridgeport/Knight Street onramp in North Richmond, providing convenient access to Highway 99 and Highway 91, allowing quick access to nearby municipalities as well as easy movement of goods across Metro Vancouver, to YVR International Airport and main shipping ports.

Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text:
Personal Real Estate Corporation
Vice President
Vice President

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited’s Investment Specialists’ Yashar Khalighi Personal Real Estate Corporation and Lawson Chu are pleased to present the opportunity to purchase 12500 Vickers Way in Richmond, British Columbia. The Subject Property is a freestanding industrial/retail building comprising of approximately 28,791 of rentable square footage on a lot size of 1.027 acres. It boasts approximately 167 feet of frontage to Vickers Way and 264 feet in depth. The Property has been extensively improved with over $500,000 worth of improvements in the last few years and hosts showroom tenancies. There are a total of four units varying from industrial warehouse to retail showrooms. There are grade loading doors at the rear of the Property along with a large paved lot area suitable for storage and additional parking. The property offers 12’ ceilings, heavy power, ample parking in front for tenants and visitors, and is sprinklered throughout. The Subject Property has flexible tenancies, presenting a partial owner-occupier, value add investment opportunity, and leasing opportunities.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Freestanding corner warehouse currently demised in 3 units - 1 leased, 1 vacant and 1 leased with possibility of vacancy upon notice. Potential redevelopment size of 27,993 SF with future road access from Shell Road. Senior Vice President

Personal Real Estate Corporation
Senior Vice President

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: On behalf of South Street Development Group, CBRE is pleased to present the developers latest commercial strata project, North Arm Business Centre. This innovative project offers thirteen (13) boutique industrial strata units for sale from 2,615 square feet in central Richmond. Units will come equipped with ample glazing and skylights, best-in-class specifications, 28’ ceiling heights, a 12’x14’ grade loading door and a finished washroom. Businesses will benefit from unfettered access to Highway 99, close proximity to Vancouver International Airport and the extensive amenities of Richmond’s City Centre, only minutes away.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | BRAND NEW INDUSTRIAL UNITS IN RICHMOND

Personal Real Estate Corporation
Senior Vice President

Personal Real Estate Corporation
Senior Vice President
Sales Trainee

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: An opportunity to invest and build equity in your own real estate at the upcoming Ironwood Landing development, located in South Richmond at 12148 Horseshoe Way. Designed by KCC Architecture, Ironwood Landing will be comprised of 18 small bay strata units starting at 2,555 square feet. The units will come equipped with ample glazing, grade loading and an enclosed 2nd level office featuring HVAC and separate entrances. Ironwood Landing is built with e-commerce warehouse needs in mind and the Industrial Business Park (IB1) zoning permits a wide variety of allowable business uses including outright office. Businesses will benefit from efficient access to Highway 99, improved travel times from the George Massey tunnel and Corridor upgrades, close proximity to Vancouver International Airport and the amenities at the Ironwood Plaza, only minutes away.
